```{r}
library(traveltimeCLT)
library(data.table)
```

```{r}
set.seed(12345)
trips <- fread("data/trips.csv")
id <- sample(unique(trips$trip), 1)
sample <- trips[trips$trip %in% id, ]
distance <- sum(sample$length)
distance
```

```{r}
simulated_route <- sample_route(distance, trips, 1000)
```
